alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:36AM CDT until July 29 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR YORK AND SOUTHERN POLK COUNTIES... At 736 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stromsburg to near Beaver Crossing, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of York and southern Polk Counties, including the following locations... Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 345 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
